children.text: Enough Said spoken word event held at Bistro 4 (4040 St. Laurent, Montreal, QC, H2W 1Y8, Canada) on February 13, 1995, hosted by Lee Gotham. Fundraiser in support of En Marge, a youth shelter in Montreal. Performances by Raymond Filip, Colin Christie, Corey Frost, Endre Farkas, Sharon H. Nelson, Steve Luxton, Ian Ferrier, Sonja Skarstedt, and more.
